alert.note: Alert for Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:36AM EST until January 10 at 2:08PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Pigg River Near Pigg River affecting Pittsylvania County. Roanoke (Staunton) River At Brookneal affecting Campbell, Charlotte and Halifax Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia... Roanoke River At Roanoke affecting Roanoke, City of Roanoke and City of Salem independent cities. Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and Halifax Counties. For the Roanoke River...including Roanoke, Pigg River, Brookneal, Randolph...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pigg River near Pigg R Nr Sandy Level. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Water reaches Graves Bridge Rd. (Route 990) downstream from gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 19.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:00 AM EST Wednesday was 19.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to 3.1 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 19.5 feet on 11/04/1985. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 215 PM EST.
